name: R.P.S: Rock Paper Scissors
description:
A game most know how to play, with some slight additions.

The game is still entirely luck based, there is no skill involved.

How To Play:

Both players start with 100 HP.

First Move:

Both players play a card to see who attacks first. A draw results in a retry.

Attacking/Defending Phase:

Both players play one card.

If its a draw - the opponent will take 10 dmg. Turn gets passed to the opponent attacking.

If its a loss - the opponent will guard the attack and take no damage. Turn gets passed to opppent attacking.

If its a win - you will stun the opponent and enter a combo phase.

Combo Phase:

Both players play all three cards in any order. The first card will go against the opponents first card, the second against the second etc.

If all 3 draw - nothing happens. Turn gets passed to opponent attacking.

If 1 card wins - the opponent will take 10 dmg. Turn gets passed to the opponent attacking.

If 3 cards win - the opponent will take 40 dmg. Turn gets passed to the opponent attacking.

If 3 cards lose - the combo gets flipped. Enters opponents combo phase.

Win / Lose:

Once the opponents health points reach 0. You win, and will be awarded with the deck you just beat!
Collect all the decks and have fun!

Thanks for playing!
